# Interoperable Use Cases for VITALS, CLINICAL ASSESSMENTS, NURSING ASSESSMENTS and SOCIAL DETERMINANTS OF HEALTH

This chapter provides references and resources for learning more about the interoperation of vitals, assessments, and social determinants of health (SDOH). 

# Assessments
* [LOINC](https://loinc.org/)
* [SNOMED CT](https://www.snomed.org/)
# Social Determinants of Health (SDOH)

* [Healthy People 2030](https://health.gov/healthypeople/objectives-and-data/social-determinants-health)
* Efforts made to standardize SDOH data elements:
  * [World Health Organization](https://www.who.int/health-topics/social-determinants-of-health#tab=tab_1)
  * [The Gravity Project](https://thegravityproject.net/)
  * [USCDI](https://www.healthit.gov/isa/uscdi-data-class/social-determinants-health)
  * Research Networks
    * [OHDSI Health Equity Workgroup](https://github.com/OHDSI/HealthEquityWG)
    * [N3C SDOH Domain Team](https://covid.cd2h.org/social-determinants)
  * Regional and National Measures and Indices
    * US Census [American Community Survey](https://www.census.gov/programs-surveys/acs)
    * Wisconsin [Area Deprivation Index](https://www.neighborhoodatlas.medicine.wisc.edu/)
    * CDC [Social Vulnerability Index](https://www.atsdr.cdc.gov/placeandhealth/svi/index.html)
    * [BIRD Index](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3432399/)
    * USDA ERS [Rural Urban Commuting Area (RUCA) Codes](https://www.ers.usda.gov/data-products/rural-urban-commuting-area-codes/documentation/)
    * USDA [Food Environment Atlas](https://www.ers.usda.gov/data-products/food-environment-atlas/)
